title: Huevos Rancheros Egg Whites Mug
directions: Spray inside of a large microwave-safe mug** with nonstick cooking spray. Stir together eggs, 1 tablespoon cheese, bacon, and chili powder in mug with a fork.
Microwave mug on HIGH 1 minute. Stir; microwave 30 seconds longer or until eggs are set. Sprinkle with remaining 1 tablespoon cheese; top with salsa.
ingredients: 2 Tbsp. Crystal Farms® Reduced-Fat Shredded Mexican 4-Cheese Blend or Monterey Jack Cheese
1 Tbsp. spicy black bean & corn tomato salsa or green taco sauce
